raw_mentions:
Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:

* Generally, active CL02A3 compounds are those having a binding constant (Kd) on the order of 10 mM or less, with Kds in the range of 100 μM, 10 μM, 1 μM, 100 nM, 10 nM, 1 nM or even lower, being preferred.
* Generally, active CL02A3 compounds are those that exhibit an IC50 in the range of 1 mM or lower, with IC50s in the range of 100 μM, 10 μM, 1 μM, 100 nM, 10 nM, 1 nM or even lower, in such competitive binding assays being preferred.

In one embodiment of the invention, the candidate compounds identified will have a dissociation constant (Kd) for CLLD8 protein on the order of 1 mM, 100 μM, 10 μM, 1 μM, 100 nM, 10 nM, 1 nM or even lower.
In another embodiment of the invention, the candidate compounds identified will exhibit an IC50 in a competitive binding assay with an active CL02A3 compound of the invention or another compound that competes for binding a CLLD8 protein with an active CL02A3 compound of the invention on the order of 1 mM, 100 μM, 10 μM, 1 μM, 100 nM, 10 nM, 1 nM or even lower.
